-	itemshop	cima#1	-1,7773,5278:5000,5375:5000,5526:5000,5550:5000,18555:5000,5480:5000,5423:5000,5467:5000,5003:5000,18600:5000,5564:5000,5690:5000,5383:5000,5292:5000,5146:5000,5373:5000,5660:5000,5374:5000,5518:5000,5013:5000,5451:5000,5452:5000,5366:5000,5506:5000,5094:5000,5658:5000,5141:5000,5780:5000,5137:5000,5170:5000,5306:5000,5039:5000,5029:5000,5025:5000,5293:5000,5064:5000,5117:5000,5110:5000,5069:5000,5061:5000,5079:5000
-	itemshop	meio#2	-1,7773,5176:2000,5314:2000,5102:2000,5325:2000,5389:2000,5800:2000,5664:2000,5471:2000,5517:2000,5121:2000,5358:2000,2286:2000
-	itemshop	baixo#3	-1,7773,5846:2000,5377:2000,5206:2000,5574:2000,5445:2000,18521:2000,5403:2000,18505:2000,5361:2000,5594:2000,5775:2000,5107:500,5532:2000
prontera,187,219,4	script	Loja Campal (ROPs)#bg	670,{
	switch( select("^00CC00•^000000 ROPs Cabeça ^00CC00(Topo).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 ROPs Cabeça ^00CC00(Meio).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 ROPs Cabeça ^00CC00(Baixo).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 Saír.") ){
		case 1: callshop "cima#1", 0; end;
		case 2: callshop "meio#2", 0; end;
		case 3: callshop "baixo#3", 0; end;	
		case 4: close;
		}
}
